name: COPT DEFENSE PROPERTIES, L.P.
sampleDescriptions: Department of Defense land lease vs land conveyance issues. Bills include the National Defense Authorization Act, the Defense Appropriations bill, MILCON, Veterans Affairs, and related Agencies.
